languages.text: И лишь тонкая фигура эльдарки стоит недвижимо на фоне замысловатых витражей, скорбным молчанием оплакивая погибших. Когда боль в душе Ирлиэт притупляется, она оборачивается к Лорд-капитану и кивает — кроткий жест благодарности за попытку спасти тех, кого едва ли можно было спасти.

And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.
languages.original_text: И лишь тонкая фигура эльдарки стоит недвижимо на фоне замысловатых витражей, скорбным молчанием оплакивая погибших. Когда боль в душе Ирлиэт притупляется, она оборачивается к Лорд-капитану и кивает — кроткий жест благодарности за попытку спасти тех, кого едва ли можно было спасти.

Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

languages.text: 只有瘦削的伊莉耶特一动不动，站在错综复杂的彩色玻璃窗下，以庄严的沉默哀悼死者。当她灵魂中的痛苦麻木之后，伊莉耶特转向领主舰长，点了点头，感谢领主舰长曾努力试图拯救过那些几乎注定难逃一死之人。
languages.original_text: And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

traits.locale_text: 只有瘦削的伊莉耶特一动不动，站在错综复杂的彩色玻璃窗下，以庄严的沉默哀悼死者。当她灵魂中的痛苦麻木之后，伊莉耶特转向领主舰长，点了点头，感谢领主舰长曾努力试图拯救过那些几乎注定难逃一死之人。

languages.text: そしてアエルダリの痩せた姿だけが、複雑なステンドグラスの窓を背景に微動だにせず、厳粛な沈黙の中、戦死者を悼んでいる。ユリエットの心の痛みが麻痺すると、彼女はロード・キャプテンの方を向いてうなずいた。救われるはずのない人々を救おうとしたことへの、短い感謝のジェスチャーである。
languages.original_text: And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

traits.locale_text: そしてアエルダリの痩せた姿だけが、複雑なステンドグラスの窓を背景に微動だにせず、厳粛な沈黙の中、戦死者を悼んでいる。ユリエットの心の痛みが麻痺すると、彼女はロード・キャプテンの方を向いてうなずいた。救われるはずのない人々を救おうとしたことへの、短い感謝のジェスチャーである。

languages.text: Y solo la delgada figura del Aeldari permanece inmóvil contra el fondo de las intrincadas vidrieras, llorando a los caídos en solemne silencio. Una vez calmado el dolor en el alma de Yrliet, se vuelve hacia {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y asiente con la cabeza, un breve gesto de gratitud por su intento de salvar a aquellos que apenas podían salvarse.
languages.original_text: And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

traits.locale_text: Y solo la delgada figura del Aeldari permanece inmóvil contra el fondo de las intrincadas vidrieras, llorando a los caídos en solemne silencio. Una vez calmado el dolor en el alma de Yrliet, se vuelve hacia {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y asiente con la cabeza, un breve gesto de gratitud por su intento de salvar a aquellos que apenas podían salvarse.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Und nur die dünne Gestalt der Aeldari steht reglos vor dem filigranen Buntglasfenster und trauert still um die Gefallenen. Nachdem der Schmerz in Yrliets Seele betäubt ist, wendet sie sich dem Lord Captain zu und nickt — eine kurze Geste der Dankbarkeit für den Versuch, jene zu retten, die kaum zu retten waren.
languages.original_text: And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

traits.locale_text: Und nur die dünne Gestalt der Aeldari steht reglos vor dem filigranen Buntglasfenster und trauert still um die Gefallenen. Nachdem der Schmerz in Yrliets Seele betäubt ist, wendet sie sich dem Lord Captain zu und nickt — eine kurze Geste der Dankbarkeit für den Versuch, jene zu retten, die kaum zu retten waren.

languages.text: Seule la mince silhouette de l'Aeldari pleurant en silence ses défunts frères se tient immobile contre la toile de fond des vitraux ouvragés. Passé le premier choc de la douleur, Yrliet se tourne vers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et lui adresse un signe de tête reconnaissant pour avoir tenté de sauver ceux dont le sort était déjà jeté.
languages.original_text: And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.

traits.locale_text: Seule la mince silhouette de l'Aeldari pleurant en silence ses défunts frères se tient immobile contre la toile de fond des vitraux ouvragés. Passé le premier choc de la douleur, Yrliet se tourne vers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et lui adresse un signe de tête reconnaissant pour avoir tenté de sauver ceux dont le sort était déjà jeté.

languages.text: Kaybettiklerinin yasını ağır bir sessizlik içinde tutan Aeldari'nin ince silueti, karmaşık desenli vitrayların önünde hareketsiz duruyor. Yrliet'in ruhundaki acı hafiflediğinde Lord Kaptan'a dönüyor ve başını eğiyor. Kurtarılması neredeyse imkânsız olanları kurtarmaya yönelik çabaları için kısa bir minnettarlık işaretinde bulunuyor.
languages.original_text: And only the thin figure of the Aeldari stands motionless against the backdrop of the intricate stained-glass windows, mourning the fallen in solemn silence. Once the pain in Yrliet's soul is numbed, she turns to the Lord Captain and nods — a short gesture of gratitude for their attempt to save those who could hardly be saved.
